Articles.Content:
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe.

Ascent ships on fire off the shoulder of the launch pad.

I watched I-beams glitter in the dark near the Armstrong memorial.

All those moments...will be lost in time.

Like tears in the rain.

Time to die.

[And remember a few things, i) SSTO does not mean 'spaceplane', ii) life is better if you don't rely on a 'score' from someone else, iii) a marketing company that doesn't know copyright law or how to communicate is not a great investment, iv) I'll probably be back anyway in a month or two, ragequits are like that (although probably under a different name, as I expect a forum ban for publishing KSP user-guides), v) it's all only a game]

iii) a marketing company that doesn't know copyright law or how to communicate is not a great investment
They definitely can be a bit bone-headed at times.
I expect a forum ban for publishing KSP user-guides
Interesting. Did you make any money off them?

Anyway, o/ Don't let the door hit ya.

I expect a forum ban for publishing KSP user-guides
Wait, what?

SSTO does not mean 'spaceplane'

let.it.go.

let.it.go.

Great now I'll have to go watch Frozen again.

I have a faint idea.

Hope to see you around Pecan.

Happy landings!

This is...interesting...

Sorry that you're leaving. Hope you don't get in trouble.

I got nothing but: sorry to see you go, welcome back when you come back, and keep on keeping on.

You got Metal Gear and in a few months Fallout, and not long after that Just Cause so it's not like you'll be hunting for games to play. I'm not a Metal Gear guy but I know a lot of my Fall and Winter will be devoted to not-KSP type games.
Thats OK, I took a yera long break because I sucked and started re-learning the game a week before 1.0. I actually am pretty good from nothing but my standard rocket design.

Would this have anything to do with attempts to update the Wiki? 19 August 2015 in particular? What a damn shame if so.

iii) You should know better to do your homework first - no matter how great it sounds or looks. I'm going to give you -1 for that.

Everything else, I give you a +1... great commentary and fun stuff/subjects.

Unfurl that spinnaker and take a nice downwind run for a while. Fair thee well.

People take their videogames soooooooooo seriously.

Help, I'm a rock.

well.. bye.

please accept this parting gift. just so you don't get bored you know.. until you get back

Man, now I'm sad.

;_:7

Help, I'm a rock.

Anyway, take it easy, Pecan.

I've seen things you people wouldn't believe.

Ascent ships on fire off the shoulder of the launch pad.

I watched I-beams glitter in the dark near the Armstrong memorial.

All those moments...will be lost in time.

Like tears in the rain.

Time to die.

It's too bad Jeb won't live, but then who does?

It's too bad Jeb won't live, but then who does?

\

.-\__.~

_||_||_

(Yeah that horrible ascii art is supposed to be an origami unicorn. The younger Old Man was obviously better at it than I)

iii) a marketing company that doesn't know copyright law or how to communicate is not a great investment, iv) I'll probably be back anyway in a month or two, ragequits are like that (although probably under a different name, as I expect a forum ban for publishing KSP user-guides)
They definitely can be a bit bone-headed at times.

Interesting. Did you make any money off them?

I have a faint idea.
Would this have anything to do with attempts to update the Wiki? 19 August 2015 in particular? What a damn shame if so.

iii) You should know better to do your homework first - no matter how great it sounds or looks. I'm going to give you -1 for that.

Everything else, I give you a +1... great commentary and fun stuff/subjects.

"The public deserves an explanation!"

Help, I'm a rock.

Great. I have my waking-up earworm.

Now I'm listening to a best of Simon & Garfunkel.

Bye Pecan, happy soothings !

Edited September 3, 2015 by Plume & Akakak
Couldn't help but notice you tripin' through the daisies 'round 'ere lately. Care to explain what all that was about?
Milk and cookies kept me awake, so... Pecan was one of the first to wecome me back in 0.25...now I'm saying goodbye to him. This sucks.

Milk and cookies kept me awake, so... Pecan was one of the first to wecome me back in 0.25...now I'm saying goodbye to him. This sucks.

No, you are not, he's already back again.
i not convinced "ragequit" mean what you think it mean ; ) huhu but feel free to try xDr

Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!

Come back while you still can!
